mapper.sql: SELECT t.id,t.task_id,t.dept_id,t.project_status,t.project_type,t.number,t.quantity,t.NAME,t.cooperative_unit,t.start_time,t.end_time,t.research_contents,t.deliverables,t.investment,t.completed_settlement,t.expected_settlement,t.intangible_assets,t.fixed_assets,t.fixed_assets_description,t.subtotal_costs,t.subtotal_costs_description,t.audit_settlement,t.audit_description,t.year1_settlement,t.year2_settlement,t.year3_settlement,t.year4_settlement,t.STATUS,t.remark,t.create_by,t.create_time,t.update_by,t.update_time,t.del_flag ,tk.`name` as taskName,d.dept_name as deptName, d.parent_id as parentId, pd.dept_name as parentName FROM t_reporting_table_research t LEFT JOIN t_reporting_task tk on t.task_id = tk.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on t.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept pd on d.parent_id = pd.dept_id
mapper.select: SELECT d.parent_id as parentId,pd.dept_id,pd.dept_name as deptName,SUM(quantity) as quantity,SUM(expected_settlement) as expected_settlement,SUM(intangible_assets) as intangible_assets,SUM(fixed_assets) as fixed_assets FROM `t_reporting_table_research` t LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on t.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept pd on d.parent_id = pd.dept_id where t.task_id = #{taskId} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.dept_id in (SELECT dept_id from t_budget_item_dept where item_id = 4) GROUP BY d.parent_id

SELECT d.parent_id as parentId,pd.dept_id,pd.dept_name as deptName,SUM(quantity) as quantity,SUM(expected_settlement) as expected_settlement,SUM(intangible_assets) as intangible_assets,SUM(fixed_assets) as fixed_assets, SUM(CASE WHEN t.status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reportNumber FROM `t_reporting_table_research` t LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on t.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept pd on d.parent_id = pd.dept_id where t.task_id = #{taskId} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.dept_id in (SELECT dept_id from t_budget_item_dept where item_id = 4) and t.status != 1 and t.status != 4 GROUP BY d.parent_id

SELECT d.parent_id as parentId,pd.dept_id,pd.dept_name as deptName,SUM(quantity) as quantity,SUM(expected_settlement) as expected_settlement,SUM(intangible_assets) as intangible_assets,SUM(fixed_assets) as fixed_assets, SUM(CASE WHEN t.status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reportNumber FROM `t_reporting_table_research` t LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on t.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept pd on d.parent_id = pd.dept_id where t.task_id = #{taskId} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.dept_id in (SELECT dept_id from t_budget_item_dept where item_id = 4) and (t.status = 3 or t.status = 5) GROUP BY d.parent_id
